item.title: Installation
item.description: The fastest way to get started with Aspect is to use the Docker image from Docker Hub: docker pull im5tu/aspect Once pulled, you can run the docker image like so: docker run -it --rm im5tu/aspect This will start a new command line with the aspect command available so you can then run one of the available commands straight away. Depending which cloud resource you intend to use, you may also need to mount credential folders.
